pages.text: Xaenon is a new endgame material, only found in the End Dimension. You can get xaenon shards from budding xaenon crystal blocks, which spawn in piles in the end.

you can use xaenon shards to make xaenon ingots by putting it in an alloy forge along with a netherite chunk. Xaenon Ingots can be used to make other xaenon items, blocks and armor!$(br2)$(6)$(l)TIP:$() you can use a mod like JEI to view all the recipes added by Contentcraft and other mods!
